name: CFH Docmail
tag_list: online, postage, hybrid-mail, printing, mailing, api, document-management, online-postal-service
overview:
From just 28p per letter, Docmail can send from as little as a single letter, to large mailshots anywhere in the UK, at low flat rate.

Docmail is run by CFH, a leading supplier of document processing solutions, document production and IT solutions with over 30 years experience.

CFH’s mission statement and core beliefs include:

  • A commitment to minimise environmental impacts
  • Offer all clients environmental alternatives, like the Toptree Initiative
  • Equal opportunities for all employees
  • Equality for all employees, customers, suppliers, visitors and contractors
  • Creating and promote a healthy and safe environment for all employees, customers, suppliers, visitors and contractors

CFH Total Document Management Ltd. (Established 1977).

The company provides a range of Printing, Mailing, IT and Document Management services and has a host of IT, printing, document processing and mail processing facilities under one roof to both businesses and the general public.

Alongside a full range of digital and conventional print services, IT systems and document solutions, CFH is an established mailing house.

CFH Docmail is a revolutionary Hybrid Mail service offering cheaper postage. Docmail turns electronic documents into complete mailings; printed, personalised, mail sorted, enclosed and posted for a flat rate, with no maximum or minimum quantity.

A SOAP-based API is available to enable integration of Docmail’s services into third party applications and websites.

milestones.description: Docmail Connect for Google Apps allows Google Apps users to print and post from anywhere at low cost. Docmail is a low cost "hybrid mail" service targeted at small and medium enterprises.
milestones.source_description: Docmail Connect for Google Apps launched!
